com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.conversation_helper

Class ConversationHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.conversation_helper.ConversationHelper

  • public final class ConversationHelper
extends Object
    Converse with the Conversation Service through text and voice. Operations on a ConversationHelper are implicitly async.
    See Also:
    ConversationHelper.Builder

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ConversationHelper.Builder
      Configures and creates a new ConversationHelper object.

    • Method Detail

      • sendText

        public void sendText(String message,
                     CompletionHandler<ConversationResponse> handler)
        Send a text message to the Conversation. This method is useful for when there is no prior context and a new ConversationHelper is starting.
        Parameters:
        message - Text message that's sent to the Conversation.
        handler - Notified when there is a response (or error) from the Conversation.

      • sendText

        public void sendText(String message,
                     Map<String,Object> context,
                     CompletionHandler<ConversationResponse> handler)
        Send a text message and some existing context to the Conversation. Use this when an existing ConversationHelper is already active.
        Parameters:
        message - Text message that's sent to the Conversation.
        context - Context from a previous point in a ConversationHelper. This can be retrieved from the ConversationResponse that's passed to a successful CompletionHandler.
        handler - Notified when there's a response (or error) from the Conversation .

      • sendVoice

        public void sendVoice(File voice,
                      CompletionHandler<SpeechResults> handler)
        Send a voice file for transcription to the SpeechToText service. This expects an audio file with WAV encoding.
        Parameters:
        voice - File with voice data for transcribing.
        handler - Notified when there's a response (or error) from the SpeechToText service.

      • sendVoice

        public void sendVoice(File voice,
                      CompletionHandler<SpeechResults> handler,
                      RecognizeOptions options)
        Send a voice file for transcription to the SpeechToText service.
        Parameters:
        voice - File with voice data for transcribing.
        handler - Notified when there's a response (or error) from the SpeechToText service.
        options - Options for the request being made (e.g. media type, timeout, etc...).

      • sendVoiceContinuous

        public void sendVoiceContinuous(InputStream audioStream,
                                TranscribeDelegate delegate)
        Continuously sends voice data from the audioStream to the SpeechToText service. Interim results are transcribed and passed to the delegate. This operation is ideal for recording microphone input via MicrophoneInputStream.
        Parameters:
        audioStream - Stream of voice data for transcribing.
        delegate - Notified when as responses (or errors) come in from the @SpeechToText service.
        See Also:
        MicrophoneInputStream

      • sendVoiceContinuous

        public void sendVoiceContinuous(InputStream audioStream,
                                TranscribeDelegate delegate,
                                RecognizeOptions options)
        Continuously sends voice data from the audioStream to the SpeechToText service. Interim results are transcribed and passed to the delegate. This operation is ideal for recording microphone input via MicrophoneInputStream.
        Parameters:
        audioStream - Stream of voice data for transcribing.
        delegate - Notified when as responses (or errors) come in from the @SpeechToText service.
        options - Options for the request being made (e.g. media type, timeout, etc...).
        See Also:
        MicrophoneInputStream

      • synthesize

        public void synthesize(String text,
                       CompletionHandler<InputStream> handler)
        Sends a text message to the TextToSpeech service for conversion to a stream of audio data. The default voice is "EN"; call synthesize(String, CompletionHandler, Voice) to use a different voice.
        Parameters:
        text - Text message that is sent to the TextToSpeech service.
        handler - Notified when there's a response (or error) from the TextToSpeech service.

      • synthesize

        public void synthesize(String text,
                       CompletionHandler<InputStream> handler,
                       Voice voice)
        Sends a text message to the TextToSpeech service for conversion to a stream of audio data.
        Parameters:
        text - Text message that is sent to the TextToSpeech service.
        handler - Notified when there's a response (or error) from the TextToSpeech service.
        voice - Voice persona for speaking the synthesized text.
